body: Let's see, lots of paint bucket, maybe some minor coloring with the stylus, didn't even bother to clean up the manga tones even though is something kinda easy to do with gaussian blur tool but again he didn't even made an effort for this one since he only used paint bucket.
I'll give this a pass considering this hentai is pretty fucking ancient. But yeah it sucks.
Had to log in to comment, what the fuck is this??? Like I mean it's awful, the least they coulda done us continue the story or better yet just stopped before the bath lol
